track.name: i like the way you kiss me

album.title: i like the way you kiss me

wiki.summary: "I Like the Way You Kiss Me" is a song by the English-Cypriot singer-songwriter Artemas. It was released on 19 March 2024 and peaked at number three on the UK Singles Chart. The song “I Like the Way You Kiss Me” is a blend of futuristic pop with influences from the moody 80s era, characterized by pulsating synths and a dark, retro-futuristic sound collage. Artemas brings his Tones and I-ish gloomy, crooning vocals to the chorus, creating a contrast to the track’s overall kinetic energy. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: "I Like the Way You Kiss Me" is a song by the English-Cypriot singer-songwriter Artemas. It was released on 19 March 2024 and peaked at number three on the UK Singles Chart. The song “I Like the Way You Kiss Me” is a blend of futuristic pop with influences from the moody 80s era, characterized by pulsating synths and a dark, retro-futuristic sound collage. Artemas brings his Tones and I-ish gloomy, crooning vocals to the chorus, creating a contrast to the track’s overall kinetic energy. The lyrics depict a narrative of a troubled relationship where the protagonist is uncertain about the status of the relationship. Ultimately, he admits to prioritizing physical intimacy over emotional connection by emphasizing the importance of sex in the relationship. Read more on Last.fm.
